title: Duterte statue in Nairobi? Afrikan Daily makes up another story
subtitle: Another
author: africacheck.org
vclaim:
, the story claimed the country’s love for Duterte was “beyond measure”.

But its shortcomings are obvious.

is responsible for fighting drug and alcohol abuse in Kenya. And the Kiswahili word

refers to marijuana not, as the story claims, methamphetamine.

unveiled in the Philippines in 2015.

All statues erected in Nairobi’s public spaces must be approved by the county government, Richard Bosire, the county's director of communication, told Africa Check. There has been no approval and there’s no statue. (
